name: Makes contact
description: User touches the target.  This triggers some abilities (e.g., [Static]{ability}) and items (e.g., [Sticky Barb]{item}).

name: Has a charging turn
description: This move has a charging turn that can be skipped with a [Power Herb]{item}.

name: Must recharge
description: The turn after this move is used, the Pokémon's action is skipped so it can recharge.

name: Blocked by Detect and Protect
description: This move will not work if the target has used [Detect]{move} or [Protect]{move} this turn.

name: Reflectable
description: This move may be reflected back at the user with [Magic Coat]{move} or [Magic Bounce]{ability}.

name: Snatchable
description: This move will be stolen if another Pokémon has used [Snatch]{move} this turn.

name: Copied by Mirror Move
description: A Pokémon targeted by this move can use [Mirror Move]{move} to copy it.

name: Punch-based
description: This move has 1.2× its usual power when used by a Pokémon with [Iron Fist]{ability}.

name: Sound-based
description: Pokémon with [Soundproof]{ability} are immune to this move.

name: Unusable during Gravity
description: This move cannot be used in high [Gravity]{move}.

name: Defrosts when used
description: This move can be used while frozen to force the Pokémon to defrost.

name: Targets opposite side in triples
description: In triple battles, this move can be used on either side to target the farthest away opposing Pokémon.

name: Heals
description: This move is blocked by [Heal Block]{move}.
